title: Deluxe Upgrades, It's Worth The Wait!
posting_body: ['Move in on August 31st!', 'Cedar Lake Apartments provides Northville residents with newly renovated, spacious one and two bedroom apartment homes along with two bedroom, 2 bath town homes.', 'Located near downtown Northville, Cedar Lake offers a location of charm, top-notch parks, an award winning school district and plenty of shopping nearby.', 'Each home offers a private entry way, one covered parking space, full size washer and dryer, plenty of storage throughout your home, and a beautiful kitchen equipped with a refrigerator/ freezer, stove/oven, microwave and a dishwasher.', 'The lower level home offers a walk out patio and all upper level homes offer a spacious balcony.', 'You will have access to our 24-hour fitness center, tennis court and a seasonal, outdoor swimming pool and spa with a sundeck.', 'Allow your pets to run freely in our newly added dog park; we are pet friendly, allowing two (2) pets each home, breed restrictions apply.', 'Looking for your forever home or just a quick visit?', 'We offer flexible lease terms ranging from 2 – 15 months.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday : 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Tuesday- Thursday : 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Friday : 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Saturday : 10:00 AM - 3:00 PM', 'Sunday : Closed']
